thread.title: Haining Open: Ding Junhui outclasses Xu Si 4-1 to advance
thread.title_full: Haining Open: Ding Junhui outclasses Xu Si 4-1 to advance

title: Haining Open: Ding Junhui outclasses Xu Si 4-1 to advance
text:
Haining Open: Ding Junhui outclasses Xu Si 4-1 to advance 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
In the opening event of the Asian tour, the Haining open, and Zhejiang Province, local fans would get to see a couple Chinese players compete in the opening round, as the top-ranked potter in the country, Ding Junhui faced amateur Xu Si. Ding Junhui outclasses Xu Si 4-1 to advance 
After missing events in Europe, the 28-year-old needs to win this event to earn a spot in the Players Tour Championship. 
However the youngster, Xu Si gives him a tough test, winning the first frame with a break of 81. 
Ding fought back in the second to level the match. He shot a break of 121 in the third and went on to win the next two frames and secure a first round victory. Related Videos
